text:
The mountain stream tree frog, northern tops frog, leaf green river tree frog or Barrington tops frog ("Ranoidea barringtonensis") is a tree frog from Australia. It lives in New South Wales.
This frog is 3.7 cm in length. It is green with dark spots and a dark stripe behind the eye. It has a white belly.
Scientists disagree about whether to call this frog "barringtonenesis" or "pearsoniana". Some say this frog and Pearson's green tree frog are two different species and some do not.
